Command-line access

If you plan to make changes, use this command to check out the code as yourself using HTTPS:

# Project members authenticate over HTTPS to allow committing changes.
{{{
svn checkout https://rapid-framework.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/rapid-maven rapid-framework --username google_code_username
}}}

When prompted, enter your generated googlecode.com password.
Use this command to anonymously check out the latest project source code:

# Non-members may check out a read-only working copy anonymously over HTTP.
{{{
svn checkout http://rapid-framework.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/rapid-maven rapid-framework-read-only
}}}
GUI and IDE access

This project's Subversion repository may be accessed using many different client programs and plug-ins. See your client's documentation for more information.
